text: The Public Prosecutor General () is the top prosecuting officer in Poland. Until 2010 and from 2016 the office was combined with the Polish Minister of Justice. Zbigniew Ziobro is current Public Prosecutor General of Poland. ==See also== * National Public Prosecutor's Office ==External links== * The Prosecution in Poland Category:Politics of Poland Category:Polish law Category:Prosecution
title: Public Prosecutor General (Poland)
